author: Special Correspondent
text:
Officials seized Rs. 72.27 lakh from two micro finance firms after ascertaining that the money was meant for disbursal among women’s self-help groups, an activity that the Election Commission had proscribed as part of the model code of conduct.

Following a tip off that money meant for disbursal among women’s SHGs was with the Suryoday Micro Finance Firm on New Street here, a team of officials descended on the finance firm and mounted a search operation that yielded a catch of Rs. 12.35 lakh. Another team searched the premises of L&T Micro Finance at Pulivalam and got hold of Rs. 59.92 lakh.
title: Rs. 72.27 lakh seized from micro finance firms
